text: not a fan just a casual listener of kpop girl groups. i must say, although le sserafim took a different approach with this album, I really think they've regained their spot! I remember seeing all the negative comments about them back then, but honestly, that was just one bad performance. These girls are seriously talented and capable—they just need songs that truly suit them. The songs fit them so well, and the concept suits the group perfectly too

author: @LesserafimGfriend
text:
HOW TO STREAM ON SPOTIFY!

Sign in to your Spotify account. 
Both Premium and Free accounts count towards streaming.

• Listen to songs at a volume above 25% and do not turn off the app or tab, or your stream will not be counted.

• Disable shuffle, automix, and autoplay.• The focus song should be repeated at least 20 times in the playlist and after this it counts towards the total streams

• DO NOT play playlists on repeat!Save at least 3 or more playlists. Free accounts should not skip ads.

• DO NOT use VPN.▲ 

For streams to be counted with maximum efficiency, use up to 6 accounts per IP (WiFi). If you can use 6 accounts to stream, there will be no problem. Do what you can to help without burdening yourself.
